explains: n. 鲷鱼；揿钮；咬人的狗；暴燥的人

sentences.en: I sat with my eyes shut and concentrated on the kitchen scents of garlic and grilled snapper.
sentences.cn: 我闭上双眼坐着，注意力集中在厨房里大蒜和烧烤小食的香味上。

sentences.en: Do not eat shark, swordfish, king mackerel, or tilefish (also called white snapper), because they contain high levels of mercury.
sentences.cn: 不要吃鲨鱼、旗鱼、青花鱼或方头鱼（也称白鲑鱼），因为它们含有大量的水银。

sentences.en: "Hundreds of snapper" perished in New Zealand.
sentences.cn: “数以百计的鱼”在新西兰遇难。
